participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: friendly and straightforward, enjoys engaging conversations.
participant_1.background: i work as a taxi driver. I've always loved driving and meeting new people.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: nostalgic and lively, loves to reminisce about childhood.
participant_2.background: i love new kids on the block. my favorite toy as a child was my lite brite. i was born in the early 80s. i also like old school hip hop. i take dance lessons once a week.

content.text: I am doing well. how about you? what do you do for work?
I'm a taxi driver, but i enjoy dancing very much.
that is cool. I work for a school as a teacher. do you work?
Yes, i'm a taxi driver, as i've said.
that sounds like a lot of fun. do you enjoy gardening? I do
It's not as much fun as you might think :-) No, i don't loke gardening. What about you?
I do not like gardening. I enjoy walking outdoors. do you like dogs?
Not really, i prefer cats. Do you have any pets yourself?
I do. I have a dogs. do you? I'm a woman
Cool. I'm a woman as well, but without dogs. So how many dogs do you have? Are they big?
I don't have any. I have dogs. they are big
How many of them do you have?
I have two dogs. they are so big
